title: Ravintola Hima Sali
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, Organic, Salad bar, Beer/Wine, European, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Restaurant and separate cafe. Two vegetarian dishes on the menu, of which one is usually vegan; the salad buffet and freshly baked bread are included. Pick-and-choose wok with tofu and fresh vegetable choices. Emphasis on organic ingredients and bread is baked in-house.
streetAddress: Tallberginkatu 1 C, Cable Factory building, Kaapelitehdas
